rows.name: Flames of Justice

Glen declares his desire to support
the weak and uphold justice! Help him
in his righteous cause!

Glen dealt ably with Sandstream,
the persecutor of Harghal. But he will
never cease to enjoin the good!

Defeat the Mysterious Driver who
appeared in Fons Maim in Invidia.

Investigate Harghal near the
Chairman's Room in Avaritia.

Ask Couche what happened between
her and Harghal. Couche's in
Rumbletum Canteen in Avaritia.

Ask Adella about Harghal. Adella's in
the lower area slum in the Admar
Storage Zone in Superbia.

Ask Adella what went on with her and
Harghal. Adella's in the lower area slum
in Superbia's Admar Storage Zone.

Find Harghal in the Old City of
Teddim in Superbia.

Defeat the Nenz Rodonya in the
Old City of Teddim in Superbia.

Question Jaruru in the Old City of
Teddim in Superbia.

Speak to Tuvarri in Port Anangham in
Superbia.

Collect two Divine Beastic Craniums
in Gula.

Get info about smuggling from Tuvarri
in Port Anangham in Superbia.
Head to Genbu Port in Luxuria.

Get info from Ransenion in Teos Aure
in Luxuria.

Head to the Old Gelgemos Gate in
Luxuria.

Question Harghal about smuggling in
the Old Gelgemos Gate in Luxuria.

Question Harghal again about
smuggling in Old Gelgemos Gate in
Luxuria.
Head to Teos Aure in Luxuria.

Defeat the Uhrl Volff terrorizing
Teos Aure in Luxuria.

Help all the citizens who were left
behind in Teos Aure, Luxuria.

Defeat the Donya Volff in Teos Aure in
Luxuria.

Defeat Sandstream in
Teos Aure in Luxuria.
Tender-Hearted Beast

Jikarao hears about a rockfall in the mines
which left several people trapped.
Hurry to the scene and help!

The humans will be more careful of the
Gogol's habitat after realizing it was
only protecting its home.

Go and help at the
scene of the incident,
Zalmor's Crevice, Luxuria.

Break the huge rock at
Zalmor's Crevice, Luxuria.

Approach the Gogol at
Zalmor's Crevice, Luxuria.

Defeat the Enraged Gogol at the snow
drifts near Zalmor's Crevice, Luxuria.

Look for the escaped Gogol
around Genbu Drifts, Luxuria.

Report to Evart at
Theospiti Temple Ruins, Luxuria.

Speak to the townsfolk around
Elmos Square, Luxuria.

Investigate the whereabouts of the
Gogol at the Three-Vein Crossroads
in Luxuria.

Find the Gogol headed for Sacred
Ice Caverns in Luxuria.

Defeat the Indignant Gogol near
the Sacred Ice Caverns in Luxuria.

Defeat the Indignant Gogol near
the Sacred Ice Caverns in Luxuria.

Defeat the Enraged Gogol near
the Sacred Ice Caverns in Luxuria.

Defeat the Indignant Gogol near
the Sacred Ice Caverns in Luxuria.

Defeat the Enraged Gogol near
the Sacred Ice Caverns in Luxuria.

Defeat the Offended Gogol's group
near the Sacred Ice Caverns in Luxuria.

Report to Evart at
Theospiti Temple Ruins, Luxuria.
Failure and Success

Vasara comes to the aid of a woman
after she is set upon by a group of men
in the poor quarter of Alba Margen.

Vasara defeated the leader of the
Bloody Lobsters, thereby doing a little
to clean up the streets of Alba Margen.

In the backstreets of
Nharil Central Plaza, Superbia,
speak to Ellenora.

Gather info about the nefarious
goings-on in Alba Margen.

Head to Ellenora's house, located
deep in the backstreets of
Nharil Central Plaza, Superbia.

Head to the meeting in the Old City of
Teddim, Superbia, late at night.

Complete the Merc Mission
"Brought to Justice 1".

Complete the Merc Mission
"Brought to Justice 2".

Complete the Merc Mission
"Brought to Justice 3".

Complete the Merc Mission
"Brought to Justice 4".
Head to Jakolo's Inn, Superbia.

Head to Ellenora's house, in the
backstreets of Nharil Central Plaza,
Superbia.

Check Ellenora's corpse in the
backstreets of Nharil Central Plaza,
Superbia.

Gather info about the Bloody
Lobsters in the Merc Mission
"Unjust Organization".

In the Chairman's Room, Avaritia
talk to Punin.

Investigate Punin's den late
at night on the Salvage Deck
in Avaritia.

Defeat the Bloody Lobsters on the
Salvage Deck in Avaritia.
ブラッド・ロブスターのブレイドを倒せ！

Defeat the Bloody Lobsters on the
Salvage Deck in Avaritia.
ブラッド・ロブスターの頭領ブレイドを倒せ！
ブラッド・ロブスターのドライバーを倒せ！
ブラッド・ロブスターのブレイドを倒せ！

プニンの暗殺を阻止することができた。
プニンに話しかけてみよう
Follow Your Passion

Go on a salvage mission to return
treasured paintings to their owner.

The paintings' grateful owner
bequeaths his shop to Yuou as thanks.
Yuou's desserts are sure to be a hit!

Listen to Bennett at
Fons Maim Gate, Invidia.

Listen to Gamri at
Fons Maim Port, Invidia.

Listen to Rhidluk in
Entertainment District, Invidia.

Aim for the Isle of Terminomni in
the Liberalitan Archipelago.

Collect a Beautiful Shoot
in the Liberalitan Archipelago.

Collect Lemon Stones in the
Liberalitan Archipelago.

Collect Hide 'n' Creepers in the
Liberalitan Archipelago.

Return to the Isle of Terminomni in the
Liberalitan Archipelago.

Collect three of Alban's Paintings on
the Isle of Terminomni in the Liberalitan
Archipelago.

Report to Alban at
Fons Maim Port, Invidia.

Go to the shop in Invidia
Commercial District.

Make some delicious cookies at the
shop in Invidia Commercial District.

Make some delicious flan at the
shop in Invidia Commercial District.

Make some delicious cake at the
shop in Invidia Commercial District.
Lost Kingdom

Self-declared king Kubira commands
you to search for his long vanquished
kingdom. Accompany him on his quest.

Kubira couldn't prove his royal
claim. But, his regal bearing is as
strong as ever...

Get a reference book from an Avaritia
bookstore and read about the history
of Kubira.

Get a reference book from an Superbian
bookstore and read about the history
of Kubira.

Get a reference book from a Luxuria
bookstore and read about the history
of Kubira.

Get a reference book from an Invidian
bookstore and read about the history
of Kubira.

Order the mercs to acquire info about
the monster who destroyed the
country of Rigideria.

Talk to Carchal who is in the
Superbian Garrison in Temperantia.

Head to the hill near the Superbian
Garrison in Temperantia in the early
morning.

Defeat the Arrogant Behemoth that
appeared near the Cloud Sea in
Temperantia.
Hero of the Nopon

Mushroom-scoffing champ Idaten is
feeling buoyant as he goes to store the
prize in his stash. Little does he know...

The 100 year old mushroom is one that
fruits eternal. Idaten gets back his
stolen goods, and cheers up!

Go to Idaten's food stash at
Goldmund Warehouse, Avaritia.

Search for the owner of the statue
"borrowed" by Idaten.

Get a Shimmering Feather from
Ansel Hatchery in the Liberalitan
Archipelago.
Go to Rumbletum Canteen in Avaritia.

Get Nefer's Underwear at
Hadashal Palace in Superbia.

Speak to Yumyum the Burglar at
Nharil Central Plaza, Superbia.

Obtain the Bloomshroom from the
Bastion of Varrac, Temperantia.

Defeat the Roiba Ignas at the
Bastion of Varrac in Temperantia.

Obtain the Bloomshroom from the
Bastion of Varrac, Temperantia.

Defeat the \[blank\] at the
Bastion of Varrac, Temperantia.

Obtain the Bloomshroom from the
treasure trove in the Bastion of Varrac,
Temperantia.

Have Pekkopeko cook with the
Bloomshroom at Rumbletum Canteen,
Avaritia.
Nature Boy

Hotaru wants to restore a wounded tree
back to health. Look for the required
medicine in Gula.

With the tree back to health, Hotaru is
heartened to see so many people share
his concern for the natural world.

In Grodd Residential Zone, Gula,
speak to Chepaan.

Collect five Olsteprinium
flowers in Temperantia.

Collect five Frozen Sapphires
from Spirit Crucible Elpys.

Collect three Amber Leaves
in Superbia.

Collect ten Ghost Dudleyas
in Luxuria.

Report to Chepaan at
Grodd Residential Zone, Gula.

Speak to Egor at Saets Lumber Co.
in Gula.

Obtain five pieces of Healing Teak
in Gula.

Report to Egor at Saets Lumber Co.
in Gula.

Use the medicine on the Saffronia tree
at Gwenith Paddies in Invidia.

Defeat Angry Durro's group
at Gwenith Paddies in Invidia.

Go to extinguish the fires at
Fons Maim Waters, Invidia.

Go to extinguish the fires at
Fons Maim Waters, Invidia.

Go to extinguish the fires at
Minnet Terrace, Invidia.
Head to Blossomshade Cliff, Invidia.

Defeat Angry Durro, Angry Rvano and
Drivers at Blossomshade Cliff, Invidia.
Our Daily Bread

Kasane gets a sudden craving for
Lucky Dawn Bread, which is only sold
at dawn. Go with her to get some!

The bakery is restored and furnished
with the ingredients for bread-making.
Fresh-baked bread for all!

Buy the Lucky Dawn Bread at the
Tilly Bakery in Tretl Windmill Plaza
in Gula.

Head to the fountain at
Tretl Windmill Plaza, Gula.

Hear what the owner of Tilly Bakery in
Tretl Windmill Plaza in Gula has
to say.

Call on Otto at Saets Lumber Co.,
Gula.

Search for Otto, who headed to
Nocclia Timber Site, Gula.

Use Field Skills to destroy the toppled
tree at Hushview Bridge, Gula.

Find Otto, who was taken to
the Tirkin Turf in Gula.

At the Tirkin Turf in Gula,
defeat the Tirkin group.
Help Otto at the Tirkin Turf in Gula.
Head to Saets Lumber Co. in Gula.

Speak to Ahato at Tretl Windmill Plaza,
Gula.

Look for Kupon at Hushview Bridge,
Gula.

Use Field Skills to destroy the toppled
tree at Hushview Bridge, Gula.

Get back the stolen goods from the
Tirkin Turf in Gula.

At the Tirkin Turf in Gula,
defeat all the Skom Tirkin groups.

Recover the stolen goods from the
Tirkin Turf in Gula.

Hand over the stolen goods to Kupon
at Hushview Bridge in Gula.

Report to Ahato at the Tilly Bakery
in Tretl Windmill Plaza, Gula.
Crystal Clear

While walking in Torigo, you are
confronted by a couple of Blades.
Could they be Core Crystal hunters?

You were able to stop the Core Crystal
hunters' plans, but Seori and her
Driver elude capture.

At Obra Street in
Gula, defeat the
crystal-hunting Blades.

In Torigo Relay Base, Gula,
speak to Ienamo.

Complete the Merc Mission
"False Rumor".

Report to Ienamo
at Torigo Relay Base, Gula.

Dispatch a squad to complete the
Merc Mission "Ambush".

Go to Valdorm's Mound, in Superbia.
(You must begin the mission "Ambush"
first.)

At Valdorm's Mound in Superbia,
defeat the crystal-hunters. (You must
begin the mission "Ambush" first.)

Report to Ienamo at Torigo Relay
Base, Gula.
Blade-Sharp Memory

A projectile suddenly landing at
Nia's feet comes with a mysterious
message... Follow its instructions.

To save her old friend Mikumari, Seori
turns on her Driver, thereby returning
herself to her crystal.

Obtain the Thunder Crystal from the
Old Quarry, Invidia.
Go to Garagorm's Arch, in Gula.

Investigate the lance that was thrown
by someone at Garagorm's Arch,
Gula.
Complete the mission "Pest Control 1".
Complete the mission "Pest Control 2".
Complete the mission "Pest Control 3".
Go to Nharil Central Plaza, in Superbia.

Investigate the lance that
Seori threw at Nharil Central Plaza,
Superbia.

Go to Lost Capital Judicium,
Temperantia.

At Lost Capital Judicium in
Temperantia, defeat
Vengeful Oswal and cronies.
Seori and Mikumari

While stopping by an Invidian cafe, you
see a boy consoling his crying younger
brother. Find out what the matter is.

Seori and Mikumari make themselves
helpful to the townsfolk to atone for
their past misdeeds.

Speak to the boys in Invidia
Commercial District.

Approach Vaio and Veero in

children in Fons Maim, Invidia.

Approach Vaio and Veero in

Eternal Spirit

In Avaritia, Tokiha is intrigued by a
noticeboard ad asking for help finding a
missing child. Let's do what we can.

Castalofer receives a stern
judgment, and the children are
returned to their homes.

Talk to Silas near the
Goldmund Flight Deck in Avaritia.

Ask around for more information
on the first floor of Avaritia.
左舷の港で聞き込みをしよう
サルベージデッキで聞き込みをしよう
中央交易所でききこみをしよう

Girl Power-Off

Hikari and Zakuro go head-to-head in an
epic struggle to determine who has the
most Girl Power. Who will it be?

The contest ends with no clear winner,
and both contestants are forced to
perform the forfeit by irate comrades.

Go to the table at Anastatia's in
Luxuria to start Zakuro and Hikari's
Girl Power contest.
All's Fair

To liven up a boring duty, Azami keeps
an eye on a suspicious group in town.
Find out what they're up to!

The plot to weaken the Divine Beast is foiled
when the suspicious group's poisoning
device is smashed.
Go to Great Blowhole, Invidia.

Go to the land adjacent to
Coralline Sanctum, Invidia.

Bearing Her Soul

Nanakoori is scouted for her singing
talents, but needs to overcome her
shyness. Help her come out of her shell.

The concert is a success. Nanakoori

front of a packed audience.

offered in the mercenary missions.

Newt Recruits

Newt is unimpressed with the training
regimen at the Superbian base. Teach

Newt foils a would-be assassin,

thanks.

Uka promises to help a lonely Phonex
called Mimi who she encounters in

After finding Mimi's friend and

Fool's Gold

Rinne is not amused after realizing a
trader tricked her into buying a barren
island. Find them and get a refund!

Rinne reclaimed her money from the
black-haired Nopon merchant and held
a lavish tea party in celebration.

Head to Avaritia to
gather information.

Tranquility

While shopping, Musubi asks for some
ingredients that have become scarce in
Gula. Go and gather them for her.

Dofusay breathes his last as he speaks
of his true feelings for Musubi. What did
he really want for her, in the end...?

Limits of Awareness

In the old tomes she's been studying,
Shiki has found coordinates for a
location. Go there and check it out!

In the depths of the World Tree,
Shiki finds a vast hoard of
ancient literature.

Look for the stone tablet near

Solve the mystery of the glowing stone

Avaritia.

the World Tree.
Go for it, Raiko!

Raiko just wants to be useful, but she
despairs when she cannot control her
power. Where did she run off to?

After grueling exercises, Raiko
gains control of her electrical power,
as well as befriending a boy called Izzi.

Catch up with Raiko somewhere
in Gula.

Catch up with Raiko somewhere
in Gula.

Catch up with Raiko somewhere
in Gula.

Speak to people in each region to raise
Raiko's Lord of Thunder power to
level five.

Look for the youth who Raiko

in Gula.
A Real Challenge

Yaegiri gathers everyone to confess
her desire to fight terrible monsters.
Hikari has one in mind...

Yaegiri brings down the beast
after a long struggle, leaving her
satisfied...for about five minutes.

Go to the library in Elmos Square,
Luxuria, to get more information about
the legendary monster.

Remove the seal of Earth from a land of
verdant forest.

Remove the seal of Fire from a
sweltering waste.

country blessed by sea breeze.

Birds of a Feather

A Nopon gets angry with Ibuki after his
guild ID was stolen by Tirkin. Find it to
prove Ibuki isn't like those birdbrains!

A friendship develops between Ibuki
and the Kountess, even though they
can't remember each other's names...
